en.serviceName: Update an appeal to the First-tier Tribunal
en.banner:
Help us improve this service
This is a new service. Help us for others to improve it by giving your feedback
en.title: Update an existing First-tier Tribunal case
en.paragraph1: Use this service to update a case that has already been submitted to the First-tier Tribunal.
en.paragraph2: You may want to send the Tribunal some extra paperwork that was not available at the time you initially submitted your tribunal form. Or you may want to give the Tribunal some extra details about aspects of your case.
en.paragraph3: To update an existing case, you will need the case reference number.
en.ogl: All content is available under the Open Government Licence v3.0, except where otherwise stated

cy.serviceName: Diweddaru apêl i’r Tribiwnlys Haen Gyntaf
cy.banner:
Helpwch ni i wella’r gwasanaeth hwn
Mae hwn yn wasanaeth newydd. Helpwch ni ei wella i bobl eraill trwy roi eich adborth
cy.title: Diweddaru achos sy’n bodoli’n barod yn y Tribiwnlys Haen Gyntaf
cy.paragraph1: Defnyddiwch y gwasanaeth hwn i ddiweddaru achos sydd wedi’i gyflwyno’n barod i’r Tribiwnlys Haen Gyntaf.
cy.paragraph2: Efallai y byddwch eisiau anfon gwaith papur ychwanegol i’r tribiwnlys nad oedd ar gael adeg cyflwyno eich ffurflen tribiwnlys wreiddiol. Neu efallai yr hoffech roi mwy o fanylion i’r Tribiwnlys am rai agweddau o’ch achos.
cy.paragraph3: I ddiweddaru achos sy’n bodoli’n barod, byddwch angen cyfeirnod yr achos.
cy.ogl: Mae’r holl gynnwys ar gael o dan Drwydded Agored y Llywodraeth f3.0, oni nodir fel arall
